Combat
Hit Points: 154 Initiative: +6 Armor Class: 15 Attacks Per Round: 4 Base/Melee/Ranged Attack: +20/+19/+22
Armor Proficiency: Heavy Shield Proficiency: Tower Weapon Proficiency: Martial
Armor: Hide Shield: Buckler Weapons: Composite Shortbow (+20 d6-1 x3@20 R70'); Flail (+19 d8-1 x2@20); Ranseur (+18 2d4-1 x3@20); Unarmed (+22 d3-1 x2@20)
Combat Notes:
Constitution Hit Points Adjustment: +40
Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: +2
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +2
Improved Initiative: +4 Initiative
Strength Attack Adjustment: -1
Strength Damage Adjustment: -1
Toughness: +3 HP
Two-handed Weapon With Buckler Penalty: -1 attack and AC
Weapon Finesse: +3 light melee weapon attack (Dexterity instead of Strength)
Blind-Fight: May reroll miss due to concealment/Invisible foe gains no melee bonus/Suffers half penalty for impaired vision
Brotherhood: +1 attack when fighting among 5+ Dorns
Clever Fighting: Inflicts +3 HP w/finesse weapon
Combat Expertise: May suffer up to -5 attack to gain equal AC bonus
Combat Reflexes: May take AOO while flat-footed and 3 AOO/rd
Improved Disarm: Disarm provokes no AOO/+4 Disarm attack
Improved Shield Bash: Suffers no AC penalty when using Shield Bash
Improved Trip: Trip provokes no AOO/+4 trip Strength check/May attack after trip
Improved Unarmed Strike: Unarmed attack provokes no AOO and may deal lethal damage
Improvised Weapon: Suffers no penalty w/improvised weapons and a -2 attack penalty for non-proficient weapons
Orc Slayer: +1 AC and melee damage vs. orcs and dworgs
Planar Fury: May gain +2 Strength, +2 Constitution, and +1 Will and suffer -1 AC for 7 rd 3/dy
Quick Draw: May draw a weapon as a free action
Stunning Fist: Unarmed strike inflicts stunned for 1 rd 5/dy (DC 21 Fort neg)
Tunnel Fighting: Suffers no penalty to AC or attack w/a one-handed weapon when squeezing
Two-Handed Focus: +1 attack when using a weapon two-handed
Save: Fortitude: +15; Reflex: +10; Will: +7
Save Notes:
Constitution Fortitude Adjustment: +2
Dexterity Reflex Adjustment: +2
Fortitude Bonus: +1 Fortitude
Lightning Reflexes: +2 Reflex
Wisdom Will Adjustment: +1
Cold Fortitude: +5 vs. cold/Suffers half nonlethal damage from cold
Magic
Spells:
Detect Outsider (Detect Outsider1 Divi): R60' Cone gives self info on outsiders for 200 min
Summon Monster I (Sunderborn1 Grea): R75' 1 1st-level creature appears and fights foes for 20 rd
Summon Monster II (Sunderborn2 Grea): R75' 1 2nd- or 1d3 1st-level creatures appear and fight foes for 20 rd
Summon Monster III (Sunderborn3 Grea): R75' 1 3rd-, 1d3 2nd-, or 1d4+1 1st-level creatures appear and fight foes for 20 rd
Summon Monster IV (Sunderborn4 Grea): R75' 1 4th-, 1d3 3rd-, or 1d4+1 lower-level creatures appear and fight foes for 20 rd
Summon Monster V (Sunderborn5 Grea): R75' 1 5th-, 1d3 4th-, or 1d4+1 lower-level creatures appear and fight foes for 20 rd
Summon Monster VI (Sunderborn6 Grea): R75' 1 6th-, 1d3 5th-, or 1d4+1 lower-level creatures appear and fight foes for 20 rd
Magic Notes:
Detect Outsider: May use Detect Outsider effects at will
Sunderborn: May use Summon Monster I, Summon Monster II, Summon Monster III, Summon Monster IV, Summon Monster V, Summon Monster VI 1/dy
